White Rotary Bobbins

 

 
Some (not all) early Model White Rotary models may have issues with the winder however there is a simple fix and there should be no issues with later models.

If you have one of these amazing old machines the correct bobbin can be a little hard to find in Australia, but I have found a manufacturer and am pleased to be able to offer them to my fellow WHITE Sewing machine enthusiasts.


 
 

 

Cyndy Kitt Productions items are also available from
Anne Bonny's Locker
